description: Returns the list of log groups that contain log anomalies.

parameters.name: InsightId
parameters.description: The ID of the insight containing the log groups.

nested_items.name: InsightId
nested_items.description: The ID of the insight containing the log groups.

nested_items.name: AnomalousLogGroups
nested_items.description: The list of Amazon CloudWatch log groups that are related to an insight.

nested_items.name: LogGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the CloudWatch log group.

nested_items.name: ImpactStartTime
nested_items.description: The time the anomalous log events began. The impact start time indicates the time of the first log anomaly event that occurs.

nested_items.name: ImpactEndTime
nested_items.description: The time the anomalous log events stopped.

nested_items.name: NumberOfLogLinesScanned
nested_items.description: The number of log lines that were scanned for anomalous log events.

nested_items.name: LogAnomalyShowcases
nested_items.description: The log anomalies in the log group. Each log anomaly displayed represents a cluster of similar anomalous log events.

nested_items.name: LogAnomalyClasses
nested_items.description: A list of anomalous log events that may be related.

nested_items.name: LogStreamName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch log stream that the anomalous log event belongs to. A log stream is a sequence of log events that share the same source.

nested_items.name: LogAnomalyType
nested_items.description: The type of log anomaly that has been detected.

nested_items.name: LogAnomalyToken
nested_items.description: The token where the anomaly was detected. This may refer to an exception or another location, or it may be blank for log anomalies such as format anomalies.

nested_items.name: LogEventId
nested_items.description: The ID of the log event.

nested_items.name: Explanation
nested_items.description: The explanation for why the log event is considered an anomaly.

nested_items.name: NumberOfLogLinesOccurrences
nested_items.description: The number of log lines where this anomalous log event occurs.

nested_items.name: LogEventTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time of the first occurrence of the anomalous log event.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to retrieve the next page of results for this operation. If there are no more pages, this value is null.
